review: OMG! A must have for T.V. entertainment.  I was skeptical at first. The stick sounded to good to be true, but it's everything it's advertised to be. Simple easy assembly!  123 you're done! Wha la! I love listening to my music on the TV through PANDORA. So many of my old movies on Netflix are at my fingertip.  Im a Prime member so the firestick gives me a cess to 1, 000's of movies. I loved watching the old comedians. There is also a parental control icon if you need to monitor tv watching for V the kiddies.
author: Elaine
